records.location_details: Location of the incident: Text Removed - Justification 3. Hospitalization in Alexandroupolis, Greece.
records.where_clear: Redacted location, hospitalization in Alexandroupolis, Greece
records.uncertainty_note: Specific incident location is redacted, but hospitalization is in Alexandroupolis.
records.context_note: On 18-03-2020 at 18:30 hours approximately, Text Removed - Justification 2,4 reported about a new confirmed case of Covid-19 in Text Removed - Justification 3. The infected person is a Text Removed - Justification 4 deployed in Text Removed - Justification 3. Text Removed - Justification 1, 2, Greek Police Officer followed the standard procedure and measures stablished by local authorities. Moreover, he immediately informed the doctor about his health status as he did not feel well. He was recommended to stay at home in quarantine and being monitored during all that time. As he did not get better, Covid-19 testing was performed and the final result was positive. Text Removed - Justification 3 police cars and office premises have been washed and disinfected. It is worth to highlight that Text Removed - Justification 5 is currently deployed in Text Removed - Justification 3; according with Text Removed - Justification 2, the infected Text Removed - Justification 4 has never been paired or been in touch with team members. Nowadays, Text Removed - Justification 4 is hospitalized in Alexandroupolis.
records.evidence_quote: On 18-03-2020 at 18:30 hours approximately, Text Removed - Justification 2,4 reported about a new confirmed case of Covid-19 in Text Removed - Justification 3.

records.location_details: Location of the incident: Text Removed - Justification 3. Hospitalization at the Military Hospital in Sofia, Bulgaria.
records.where_clear: Redacted location, hospitalization in Sofia, Bulgaria
records.uncertainty_note: Specific incident location is redacted, but hospitalization is in Sofia.
records.context_note: On 18.03.2020 around 14:30 one Text Removed - Justification 4 deployed in Text Removed - Justification 3 has been hospitalized at the Military Hospital in Sofia. According to the doctor, he presented compatible symptoms with Covid-19 such as difficulties while breathing. Two days ago he felt some pain in his chest and lungs. He received immediate medical assistance but no further measures were considered necessary. Nevertheless, this morning he had some problems with his breathing and went to the urgency services to be checked. He was sent to the Military Hospital in Sofia for additional medical checks. On 20.03.2020 around 10:30, Text Removed - Justification 4 was informed that Covid-19 test gave a NEGATIVE result. At 13:30 Text Removed - Justification 4 left the Military Hospital and he was sent to his accommodation in Sofia. The Covid-19 testing has been done. The analysis results will be delivered on tomorrow afternoon. Meanwhile Text Removed - Justification 4 is monitoring the situation; Text Removed - Justification 4 is isolated at this hospital. Text Removed - Justification 2, 3 has been already informed about this issue. Text Removed - Justification 4 will share more information about this situation as soon as he will receive it. After the release to COVID-19 test final result, no further measures was taken by the medical staff in charge for this case. Text Removed - Justification 4 is continuously checked and assisted by hospital doctors and medical staff. Bulgarian authorities inform that Text Removed - Justification 4 will remain one week without performing shifts just as a preventive measure (not a quarantine).
records.evidence_quote: On 18.03.2020 around 14:30 one Text Removed - Justification 4 deployed in Text Removed - Justification 3 has been hospitalized at the Military Hospital in Sofia.

records.location_details: Location of the incident: Text Removed - Justification 6. Related to Federal Police Headquarters and a laboratory.
records.where_clear: Redacted location, related to Federal Police Headquarters
records.uncertainty_note: Location is redacted and generic, related to Federal Police Headquarters without specific city.
records.context_note: On the 04.03.2020 personnel Text Removed - Justification 6 informed the Federal Police Headquarters that Text Removed - Justification 4, exhibited symptoms of COVID 19 (fever, chest pain, headache, heavily tired). At the moment Text Removed - Justification 4 is not on duty and at home. Text Removed - Justification 4 stated that they were in contact with travelers coming from Northern Italy, among others. The medical department of the Federal Police is informed and involved. A test will be performed today and evaluated in a laboratory in Text Removed - Justification 6 to define the real nature of the illness. Text Removed - Justification 6 authorities are monitoring closely the situation and Frontex will be informed accordingly. The result of the rapid test of COVID-19 performed by the team member deployed is negative. The case is consider closed as per Sl coordinator decision.
records.evidence_quote: On the 04.03.2020 personnel Text Removed - Justification 6 informed the Federal Police Headquarters that Text Removed - Justification 4, exhibited symptoms of COVID 19 (fever, chest pain, headache, heavily tired).
